channel.title: Helpers :: go-testdeep
channel.description: HTTP API test helper aka tdhttp The tdhttp package helper allows to easily test HTTP APIs. It handles any kind of API, with some specific features for the routes accepting and/or returning JSON or XML. All known web frameworks are handled: net/http standard, see Main example below Beego echo Gin gorilla/mux go-swagger HttpRouter pat and any other ones as long as they provide a net/http.Handler instance.
